title: Build a Page Grid Layout
description:
Create a page layout with header, sidebar, main content, and footer using CSS Grid.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.page-grid`:
   - Use CSS Grid layout
   - Define template areas for header, sidebar, main, footer
   - Minimum height of 100vh
   - Sidebar column should be 250px, main should take remaining space

2. Assign grid areas:
   - `.header` - grid-area: header
   - `.sidebar` - grid-area: sidebar
   - `.main` - grid-area: main
   - `.footer` - grid-area: footer

3. Style backgrounds:
   - Header: #333 background, white text
   - Sidebar: #f5f5f5 background
   - Footer: #333 background, white text

## Expected Result

A classic page layout with fixed-width sidebar and fluid main content.

testCases.description: Page grid should use CSS Grid
Page grid should have minimum height of 100vh
Header should have correct grid area
Sidebar should have correct grid area

hints: Use display: grid on the container
Define grid-template-areas with 'header header' for the first row, 'sidebar main' for the middle, 'footer footer' for the last
Use grid-template-columns: 250px 1fr for sidebar and main widths
Assign each element its grid-area (e.g., grid-area: header)
